p: We describe the synthesis of morpholine-containing α,β-unsaturated ketones, and the results of an investigation of their MAOs and AChE inhibition profiles. Most of the nine compounds synthesised exhibited potent MAO-B inhibition with moderate AChE inhibition. Interestingly, MO1 (the lead compound) inhibited MAO-B inhibition in the low nanomolar range and was more potent than lazabemide (the reference compound). The low cytotoxicity and the ability of MO1 to transit the BBB support our drug design strategy. In addition, the ROS scavenging efficacy of MO1 suggests improved neuroprotective effects.
